dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] a4y - imagevenue / theplanet]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2005 1:49 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; area52@bellsouth.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] a4y - imagevenue / theplanet]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] a4y - imagevenue / theplanet
Date: Thu, 30 Jun 2005 08:36:37 -0400
From: Admin <area52@bellsouth.net>
Reply-To: admin@apic-worldwide.com
Organization: APIC-Worldwide
To: <imagevenue@gmail.com>, "Vlad L" <vladiru@gmail.com>,
<juraslob@gmail.com>,        <abuse@theplanet.com>, <copyright@theplanet.com>,
<abuse@iweb.ca>
CC: tman@asian4you.com, KenM <ken@asian4you.com>





NOTICE of COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT





ASIAN4YOU

JPONLINE Inc.

5 Jupiter House, Calleva Park

Aldermaston

Reading Berks, UK  RG7 8NN











Date:  June 30, 2005



To:



ISP:

traceroute to IMG5.IMAGEVENUE.COM (209.172.35.114) traceroute to
IMAGEVENUE.COM (67.18.131.202)



////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Infringing URLs:



C JP ONLINE / ASIAN4YOU

http://img5.imagevenue.com/loc37/th_f7d_choh05a002.jpg

through

http://img1.imagevenue.com/loc286/th_eaa_choh05a084.jpg



http://img6.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc87
<http://img6.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc87&image=f50_choh04a002.jpg>
&image=f50_choh04a002.jpg

through

http://207.150.164.10/img.php?loc=loc183
<http://207.150.164.10/img.php?loc=loc183&image=e68_choh04a049.jpg>
&image=e68_choh04a049.jpg



AND ALL RELATED

Linked from here

http://www.palacemoon.com/cache/subject/60/98/98344.html#1090271415



http://www.palacemoon.com/cache/subject/60/98/98343.html#1090271412









////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////




Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO (World
Intellectual Property Organization)
(<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>), this letter serves
as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.



Steve Easton is a DMCA agent, NOT an attorney. On behalf of the owner of
exclusive right to the  material at issue in this notice, I hereby state
that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the  owner, its agent, or the law. I
hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States,
that the information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this
notification.

















////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///





- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
